attributes.action: Reverse the decision to award Nick Clegg a knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
He called for Britain to join the Euro. 

He wants a second referendum.

He labelled Nigel Farage's warnings of an EU army as a 'dangerous fantasy' only for an EU army to start to form.
attributes.background: This man is a failed politician. He broke major promises to students in 2010 over tuition fees just so he could get a position of power in a coalition government.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
